entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:26 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 06:52 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers or drizzle ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle later this morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
